item.title: Tutorial
item.description: Let’s build a simple game using 24a2. In our game, we’ll have a player who can move around and collect items. Each item will give the player a number of points. There will also be bad items, which end the game. TODO: metaphor 1. Basic setup 24a2 games are written in JavaScript, and are played in the browser. In this step, we’ll create two files, an index.html which stores the content of our webpage, and game.
